data.title: Ambush
data.description: Great leaders inspire greatness in others.

data.title: Rising Malevolence
data.description: Belief is not a matter of choice, but of conviction.

data.title: Shadow of Malevolence
data.description: Easy is the path to wisdom for those not blinded by ego.

data.title: Destroy Malevolence
data.description: A plan is only as good as those who see it through.

data.title: Rookies
data.description: The best confidence builder is experience.

data.title: Downfall of a Droid
data.description: Trust in your friends, and they’ll have reason to trust in you.

data.title: Duel of the Droids
data.description: You hold onto friends by keeping your heart a little softer than your head.

data.title: Bombad Jedi
data.description: Heroes are made by the times.

data.title: Cloak of Darkness
data.description: Ignore your instincts at your peril.

data.title: Lair of Grievous
data.description: Most powerful is he who controls his own power.

data.title: Dooku Captured
data.description: The winding path to peace is always a worthy one, regardless of how many turns it takes.

data.title: The Gungan General
data.description: Fail with honor rather than succeed by fraud.

data.title: Jedi Crash
data.description: Greed and fear of loss are the roots that lead to the tree of evil.

data.title: Defenders of Peace
data.description: When surrounded by war, one must eventually choose a side.

data.title: Trespass
data.description: Arrogance diminishes wisdom.

data.title: The Hidden Enemy
data.description: Truth enlightens the mind, but won’t always bring happiness to your heart.

data.title: Blue Shadow Virus
data.description: Fear is a disease; hope is its only cure.

data.title: Mystery of the Thousand Moons
data.description: A single chance is a galaxy of hope.

data.title: Storm over Ryloth
data.description: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

data.title: Innocents of Ryloth
data.description: The costs of war can never be truly accounted for.

data.title: Liberty on Ryloth
data.description: Compromise is a virtue to be cultivated, not a weakness to be despised.

data.title: Hostage Crisis
data.description: A secret shared is a trust formed.

data.title: Holocron Heist
data.description: A lesson learned is a lesson earned.

data.title: Cargo of Doom
data.description: Overconfidence is the most dangerous form of carelessness.

data.title: Children of the Force
data.description: The first step to correcting a mistake is patience.

data.title: Senate Spy
data.description: A true heart should never be doubted.

data.title: Landing at Point Rain
data.description: Believe in yourself or no one else will.

data.title: Weapons Factory
data.description: No gift is more precious than trust.

data.title: Legacy of Terror
data.description: Sometimes, accepting help is harder than offering it.

data.title: Brain Invaders
data.description: Attachment is not compassion.

data.title: Grievous Intrigue
data.description: For everything you gain, you lose something else.

data.title: The Deserter
data.description: It is the quest for honor that makes one honorable.

data.title: Lightsaber Lost
data.description: Easy isn’t always simple.

data.title: The Mandalore Plot
data.description: If you ignore the past, you jeopardize the future.

data.title: Voyage of Temptation
data.description: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.

data.title: Duchess of Mandalore
data.description: In war, truth is the first casualty.

data.title: Senate Murders
data.description: Searching for the truth is easy. Accepting the truth is hard.

data.title: Cat and Mouse
data.description: A wise leader knows when to follow.

data.title: Bounty Hunters
data.description: Courage makes heroes, but trust builds friendships.

data.title: The Zillo Beast
data.description: Choose what is right, not what is easy.

data.title: The Zillo Beast Strikes Back
data.description: The most dangerous beast is the beast within.

data.title: Death Trap
data.description: Who my father was matters less than my memory of him.

data.title: R2 Come Home
data.description: Adversity is a friendship’s truest test.

data.title: Lethal Trackdown
data.description: Revenge is a confession of pain.

data.title: Clone Cadets
data.description: Brothers in arms are brothers for life.

data.title: ARC Troopers
data.description: Fighting a war tests a soldier’s skills, defending his home tests a soldier’s heart.

data.title: Supply Lines
data.description: Where there’s a will, there’s a way.

data.title: Sphere of Influence
data.description: A child stolen is a hope lost.

data.title: Corruption
data.description: The challenge of hope is to overcome corruption.

data.title: The Academy
data.description: Those who enforce the law must obey the law.

data.title: Assassin
data.description: The future has many paths – choose wisely.

data.title: Evil Plans
data.description: A failure in planning is a plan for failure.

data.title: Hunt for Ziro
data.description: Love comes in all shapes and sizes.

data.title: Heroes on Both Sides
data.description: Fear is a great motivator.

data.title: Pursuit of Peace
data.description: Truth can strike down the spectre of fear.

data.title: Nightsisters
data.description: The swiftest path to destruction is through vengeance.

data.title: Monster
data.description: Evil is not born, it is taught.

data.title: Witches of the Mist
data.description: The path to evil may bring great power, but not loyalty.

data.title: Overlords
data.description: Balance is found in the one who faces his guilt.

data.title: Altar of Mortis
data.description: He who surrenders hope, surrenders life.

data.title: Ghosts of Mortis
data.description: He who seeks to control fate shall never find peace.

data.title: The Citadel
data.description: Adaptation is the key to survival.

data.title: Counterattack
data.description: Anything that can go wrong will.

data.title: Citadel Rescue
data.description: Without honor, victory is hollow.

data.title: Padawan Lost
data.description: Without humility, courage is a dangerous game.

data.title: Wookie Hunt
data.description: A great student is what the teacher hopes to be.

data.title: Water War
data.description: When destiny calls, the chosen have no choice.

data.title: Gungan Attack
data.description: Only through fire is a strong sword forged.

data.title: Prisoners
data.description: Crowns are inherited, kingdoms are earned.

data.title: Shadow Warrior
data.description: Who a person truly is cannot be seen with the eye.

data.title: Mercy Mission
data.description: Understanding is honoring the truth beneath the surface.

data.title: Nomad Droids
data.description: Who’s the more foolish, the fool or the fool who follows him?

data.title: Darkness on Umbara
data.description: The first step towards loyalty is trust.

data.title: The General
data.description: The path of ignorance is guided by fear.

data.title: Plan of Dissent
data.description: The wise man leads, the strong man follows.

data.title: Carnage of Krell
data.description: Our actions define our legacy.

data.title: Kidnapped
data.description: Where we are going always reflects where we came from.

data.title: Slaves of the Republic
data.description: Those who enslave others, inevitably become slaves themselves.

data.title: Escape from Kadavo
data.description: Great hope can come from small sacrifices.

data.title: A Friend in Need
data.description: Friendship shows us who we really are.

data.title: Deception
data.description: All warfare is based on deception.

data.title: Friends and Enemies
data.description: Keep your friends close, but keep your enemies closer.

data.title: The Box
data.description: The strong survive, the noble overcome.

data.title: Crisis on Naboo
data.description: Trust is the greatest of gifts, but it must be earned.

data.title: Massacre
data.description: One must let go of the past to hold on to the future.

data.title: Bounty
data.description: Who we are never changes, who we think we are does.

data.title: Brothers
data.description: A fallen enemy may rise again, but the reconciled one is truly vanquished.

data.title: Revenge
data.description: The enemy of my enemy is my friend.

data.title: Revival
data.description: Strength of character can defeat strength in numbers.

data.title: A War on Two Fronts
data.description: Fear is a malleable weapon.

data.title: Front Runners
data.description: To seek something is to believe in its possibility.

data.title: The Soft War
data.description: Struggles often begin and end with the truth.

data.title: Tipping Points
data.description: Disobedience is a demand for change.

data.title: The Gathering
data.description: He who faces himself, finds himself.

data.title: A Test of Strength
data.description: The young are often underestimated.

data.title: Bound for Rescue
data.description: When we rescue others, we rescue ourselves.

data.title: A Necessary Bond
data.description: Choose your enemies wisely, as  they may be your last hope.

data.title: Secret Weapons
data.description: Humility is the only defense against humiliation.

data.title: A Sunny Day in the Void
data.description: When all seems hopeless, a true hero gives hope.

data.title: Missing in Action
data.description: A soldier’s most powerful weapon is courage.

data.title: Point of No Return
data.description: You must trust in others or success is impossible.

data.title: Eminence
data.description: One vision can have many interpretations.

data.title: Shades of Reason
data.description: Alliances can stall true intentions.

data.title: The Lawless
data.description: Morality separates heroes from villains.

data.title: Sabotage
data.description: Sometimes even the smallest doubt can shake the greatest belief.

data.title: The Jedi Who Knew Too Much
data.description: Courage begins by trusting oneself.

data.title: To Catch a Jedi
data.description: Never become desperate enough to trust the untrustworthy.

data.title: The Wrong Jedi
data.description: Never give up hope, no matter how dark things seem.

data.title: The Unknown
data.description: The truth about yourself is always the hardest to accept.

data.title: Conspiracy
data.description: The wise benefit from a second opinion.

data.title: Fugitive
data.description: When in doubt, go to the source.

data.title: Orders
data.description: The popular belief isn’t always the correct one.

data.title: An Old Friend
data.description: To love, is to trust. To trust is to believe.

data.title: The Rise of Clovis
data.description: Jealousy is the path to chaos.

data.title: Crisis at the Heart
data.description: Deceit is the weapon of greed.

data.title: The Disappeared Pt. 1
data.description: Without darkness there cannot be light.

data.title: The Disappeared Pt. 2
data.description: Wisdom is born in fools as well as wise men.

data.title: The Lost One
data.description: What is lost is often found.

data.title: Voices
data.description: Madness can sometimes be the path to truth.

data.title: Destiny
data.description: Death is just the beginning.

data.title: Sacrifice
data.description: Facing all that you fear will free you from yourself.

data.title: The Bad Batch
data.description: Embrace others for their differences, for that makes you whole.

data.title: A Distant Echo
data.description: The search for truth begins with belief.

data.title: On the Wings of Keeradaks
data.description: Survival is one step on the path to living.

data.title: Unfinished Business
data.description: Trust placed in another is trust earned.

data.title: Gone with a Trace
data.description: If there is no path before you, create your own.

data.title: Deal No Deal
data.description: Mistakes are valuable lessons often learned too late.

data.title: Dangerous Debt
data.description: Who you were does not have to define who you are.

data.title: Together Again
data.description: You can change who you are, but you cannot run from yourself.
